title: ## AttributeError: type object 'torch._C._VariableFunctions' has no attribute 'lstm'
body_html:
Hi, all.
I used the Pytorch to build the MLP model before, and I was trying to realize the LSTM with this code on my own data. However, the following error was occurred. It seems that it doesn't exit the attribute ._C._VariableFunctions.

Does anyone have any clue for this problem? Thanks for your help in advance.

Best regards
Irving
